summary: An ordinance relating to the Department of Streets and Sewers, creating certain additional positions of Auto Repairman and Auto Repairman's Helper, made necessary by the delegation to said department of the control and jurisdiction over the automobile equipment of the City; appropriating funds therefor and for the purchase of supplies and material, and withholding from the Surplus Account of certain City departments unexpended and unencumbered appropriations in the 1933 budget therefor.
